101. MOMENTO DE UNA FUERZA (Ejercicio 2)

ARPERS ELERS LERS LINS LELLIS Calcular el momento total de las fuerzas en cada caso:\n(a) [imath] \quad [/imath] (b) [imath] \quad [/imath] (b) [imath] \quad [/imath] (c)\n[imath] \begin{array}{|c|c|c|}\hline \text { Ton } & {} & {\text { is } N} \\ \hline \text { a0 com } & {} & {3 m} \\ \hline & {} \\ \hline & {\text { ton }} & {} \\ \hline\end{array} [/imath][imath]\hline \text { Ton } & {} & {\text { is } N} [/imath] [imath] \hline \text { a0 com } & {} & {3 m} [/imath] [imath] \hline & {} [/imath] [imath] \hline & {\text { ton }} & {} [/imath] [imath] \hline[/imath]
